body: @2665358694 I'm fully aware that this is a paid only work..not that I give a damn. As talented as the artist is, I'm glad to be able to view their work for free. I never would have otherwise.

the artist who create this work named "雪ノ岚と异端丶" comes from China , this work the limit content which meams you need to pay for it and never spread. but it have been sold for a long time.

Oh the artist is wrong then, I got confused since this Roza looks incredibly similar to Longbow's. I don't think the tag can be removed tho, not to mention that Longbow himself has a good number of doujins where he's untagged.
surprisingly hard to find leak of this artist's works, whoever doing this is a hero
@khangbahuy Sounds good. Feel free to share the link here just in case nhentai doesn't re-upload it.
@Quality Fun tks i'll post it up on e-hentai then

The art style is indeed similar to Longbow Flintlock's, which is a painful reminder of the ones he pay walled. It isn't the same artist, though. @khangbahuy you don't directly upload to nhentai; rather, this site gets its material from other sites such as ehentai and exhentai, which anyone can directly upload to. Do that and hope that it eventually finds its way to nhentai. We'd be grateful for your willingness to share.

I don't seem to see any settings, maybe it's just the staff that publishes. try to contact them.
Email: hey@nhentai.net (if you have a technical problem, include your operating system and browser info, with version numbers)
Abuse: abuse@nhentai.net
Twitter: @nhentaiOfficial
